/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Power lines crisscross above the street, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees and shrubs, providing a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
